text: Porcine pathogenic E. coli involved in PWD typically belong to serogroups O8, O138, O139, O141, O147, O157 and O149, the latter being the predominant serogroup in most countries [56, 57] . The most implicated virotype in PWD is ETEC: LT: STb: F4 [6] . However, O serogroup and virulence gene patterns vary from region to region and over time [2] .
